name: Yaojing
description: The Yaojing is a celestial creature exuding neutrality and benevolence, characterized by its agility and intelligence, making it formidable in combat. It possesses a radiant appearance marked by its magical abilities.
memorable: Its ability to detect lies enhances both its social interactions and combat effectiveness, while its magical weapon attacks offer versatility against various resistances.
goals: To maintain balance and assist allies while punishing those who spread deception or evil.
relations: Often aligns with other celestial beings or adventurers, potentially serving as a guardian or ally.
environment: Typically found in places of neutrality or areas where good and evil intersect.
strengths: Excels in dexterity and charisma, making it effective in combat and social situations. High magical resistance and ability to discern deceit.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks that bypass its resistances.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack involving a melee sacred fist and a ranged sacred bolt, both dealing radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Radiant Spin is a strong area effect attack that delivers significant damage and pushes foes away.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive hidden enemies or illusions.
skills: Proficient in Insight and Perception, reflecting its ability to detect lies and notice hidden threats.
additional_information: Charlatan’s Bane detects lies, giving it an advantage on Insight checks.
Magic Resistance provides an edge against spells and magical effects.
Motion Blur grants disadvantage on attacks against it when it moves.
Can innately cast spells without verbal or material components.
Radiant-themed abilities highlight its celestial nature.
spellcasting: Can innately cast spells including Detect Evil and Good, Silence, Beacon of Hope, Bestow Curse, Death Ward, and Dispel Evil and Good.
test_queries: neutral good magic user with radiant abilities
agile creature with area effect attack
